name: Forever Falling (LD31)
description:
Flip gravity in this action platformer to make it to the end of each stage! Collect coins to increase your score - but beware the spikes! Smashing into walls at high velocity will bump your score too, but make sure you don't run out of time.

This game was submitted for Ludum Dare 31, my first ever game jam. I took part in the compo, which was perhaps a bit ambitious for my first jam, but I remember the game ranked reasonably highly in the rankings.
